thread.section_title: Hotel Palladium Palace - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location and nice size room
thread.title_full: Great Location and nice size room - Review of Hotel Palladium Palace, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Simon225
title: Great Location and nice size room
text: Very happy with this hotel. they upgraded us. We were given this when we selected a mystery hotel and couldn't have been happier. It was just one night but I would stay again. Very close to Termini. We just walked with our bags to the station and it only took a few minutes.
